TopicTitle: Get Kerbal Space Program for 40% Off on Steam!

Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://store.steampowered.com/app/220200/?snr=1_7_15__13"><strong><img alt="image" src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/5a2d4944cb6d68d64a0aea92e9e20102/tumblr_inline_myn0ah6Wbl1rr2wit.png"/></strong></a></p>

<p>Today and tomorrow only, purchase <em><strong>Kerbal Space Program</strong></em> for <strong>40% off</strong> in the <a href="http://store.steampowered.com/app/220200/?snr=1_7_15__13"><strong>Steam Holiday Sale</strong></a>. It’s an easy way to earn yourself trading cards and science at the same time!*</p>
You will spend more money on steam than when KSP at its normal price
